name: tm17
effect: Teaches Protect to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Protect to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Submission)

flavor_text.emerald: Negates all damage, but may fail if used in succession.
flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Negates all damage, but may fail if used in succession.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Enables the user to evade all attacks. It may fail if used in succession.
